attributes.background: This will increase quality of learning for certain pupils whilst also allowing others who are academically challenged to focus on a certain job or apprenticeship.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find out more about the school leaving age here:

https://www.gov.uk/know-when-you-can-leave-school

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
